A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The character DJ was underutilized.
The film could have explored the Grey Side of the force\, but seemed to get scared of deviating into interesting story telling.
Luke Skywalker died unnecessarily.
Leia should have died\, but she suddenly became a green lantern and flew through space.

I loved the climax throne room scene\, but it let me down in the end. Half of the movie ended up being unnecessary. In fact\, it was like the whole movie made a point of Finn being a useless character.

Poe got almost equally terrible treatment. He was just a useless idiot.

I know I said it already\, but I liked DJ a lot. I wanted more of him. I'd watch a show based entirely on him.

Lazy writing... The studio seems to have a great third movie planned\, and this installment in the trilogy feels as though it was meant to kill time. It sort of seems like the stuff you'd usually see in the scrolling text explaining a time skip between previous Star Wars entries.
